text:
As a long term fan of your VGMs, an arts critic and a composer (also musician) myself... Could I ask of you a transcription? I'd gladly like to transcribe and reinterpret this song at the piano, maybe extend it, but everything under your approval and acceptance.
If yes, I'll gladly lend you my e-mail.

author: ChetChat

text: I was cleaning up my computer when I found this song hidden deep within some documents. That's actually the first thing I composed when I had just started playing around with music. Probably about 5 or more years ago, I was using an old version of FL Studio with stock instruments and zero effects. It was about someone dying and thinking back on his life and his accomplishments. I remember I wanted the piano in the end to sound like a beating heart slowly stopping.
author: SupraDarky
